scripts.test: npm run build:webpack && (http-server tests/pages -s -p 3001 &  mocha tests/mocha.js)
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:webpack:prod && cd dist/;zip -r ../cba.zip .;cd ..
scripts.build:webpack: npm run clean && npm run import:components && webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build:webpack:watch: npm run clean && npm run import:components && webpack --config webpack.config.js --watch
scripts.build:webpack:prod: npm run clean && npm run import:components && webpack --config webpack.config.js --prod
